article_title: Cool Friday Night, Slight Chance Of Rain Saturday For OK - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
Skies stay partly cloudy Friday night and the wind stays light. Any rain chances will stay in the panhandle.

Our south wind will pick up quite a bit Saturday afternoon. Wind will blow between 20 to 30 mph with temperatures climbing to around 70 degrees. Skies will be mostly cloudy with a slight chance of rain.

News 9 Meteorologist Cassie Heiter says, “I wouldn’t cancel any outdoor plans.”

Sunday looks more active with a slight chance of showers and storms in the afternoon. Temperatures will push into the mid 80's. Chances for storms increase Sunday evening into Sunday night. Some of these storms could become strong to severe with hail and damaging winds possible, so stay weather aware.
